name: Castle Defender (itch) (notSailor)
description:
Castle Defender

-----------------------------------------------

It is a FPS game which is you try to defend your castle from the enemies.

Every time you kill an enemy, they drop coins.

Collect the coins to buy ammo for your guns.

IMPORTANT:

To change weapon, press the middle mouse button. Enjoy :)

-----------------------------------------------

For Setup:

Extract the rar file and double click "CastleDefender.exe" to play the game.

(It is recommended to play this game with at least GTX 1050 Tİ)
